content: This iconic structure, located in Paris, France, was once criticized for its design but is now one of the most visited monuments in the world.

Oh, you're talking about the Eiffel Tower, right? It's fascinating how opinions can change over time. The Eiffel Tower was indeed criticized when it was first built for its unique design, but now it's an iconic symbol of Paris and attracts millions of visitors each year. It's amazing how something that was once seen as ugly can become so beloved.
